data.description:
2682 Mango Light Ave, North Las Vegas, NV 89086 is a townhome home that contains 1,695 sq ft and was built in 2021. It contains 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms. This home last sold for $280,990 in July 2021. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $364,700. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $2,011/mo.
